title: Malaysia Foreign Direct Investment
description: Foreign Direct Investment in Malaysia increased by 12308.34 MYR Million in the third quarter of 2022. Foreign Direct Investment in Malaysia averaged 8121.24 MYR Million from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 24690.41 MYR Million in the fourth quarter of 2021 and a record low of -1982.56 MYR Million in the fourth quarter of 2009. This page provides - Malaysia Foreign Direct Investment- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Department of Statistics, Malaysia
